name: study-abroad-branding-lp
description: 留学サポートブランディングLP - 10代の可能性を花開かせる留学サポートサービス

scripts.build: npm run build:prepare && npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run copy:assets
scripts.build:css: npx sass src/scss/main.scss dist/css/main.css --style compressed && npx postcss dist/css/main.css --use autoprefixer -r
scripts.build:dev: npm run build:prepare && npm run build:css:dev && npm run build:js:dev && npm run copy:assets
scripts.build:js:dev: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); fs.mkdirSync('dist/js', {recursive: true}); fs.copyFileSync('src/js/main.js', 'dist/js/main.js')"
scripts.watch: npm run watch:css & npm run watch:js
scripts.dev: npm run build:dev && npm run watch & npm run serve
scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run format

author: 留学サポートチーム
